nodes.text: NP-G1 was a yellow droid that was forced to work in the criminal Pyke Syndicate's spice mines on the planet Kessel during the reign of the Galactic Empire. In 10 BBY, NP-G1 was freed from slavery when its restraining bolt was removed during a slave revolt in the mines started by the droid L3-37.
NP-G1 first appeared in the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story and was first identified on a card in the Star Wars: Card Trader app.
